entity.description: Template for a contract containing the standard attributes of a contract.

attributes.name: contracttemplateid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the contract template.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the contract template was created.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the contract template.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the contract template was last modified.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the contract template.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the contracttemplate.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the contracttemplate.

attributes.name: organizationid
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the organization

attributes.name: versionnumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: importsequencenumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddencreatedon
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: abbreviation
attributes.description: Abbreviation of the contract template name.

attributes.name: allotmenttypecode
attributes.description: Criteria for the contracts based on the template, such as number of cases, time, or coverage dates.

constrainedList.name: contracttemplate_allotmenttypecode
constrainedList.description: Criteria for the contracts based on the template, such as number of cases, time, or coverage dates.

attributes.name: billingfrequencycode
attributes.description: How often the customer or account is to be billed in contracts that are based on the template.

constrainedList.name: contracttemplate_billingfrequencycode
constrainedList.description: How often the customer or account is to be billed in contracts that are based on the template.

attributes.name: componentstate
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: contractservicelevelcode
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the level of service specified in contracts that are based on the template.

constrainedList.name: contracttemplate_contractservicelevelcode
constrainedList.description: Unique identifier of the level of service specified in contracts that are based on the template.

attributes.name: contracttemplateidunique
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the contract template.

attributes.name: effectivitycalendar
attributes.description: Days of the week and times for which contracts based on the template are effective.

attributes.name: iscustomizable
attributes.description: Information that specifies whether this component can be customized.

attributes.name: ismanaged
attributes.description: Indicates whether the solution component is part of a managed solution.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the contract template.

attributes.name: overwritetime
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: solutionid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the associated solution.

attributes.name: usediscountaspercentage
attributes.description: Specifies whether the discount is a percentage or a monetary amount in contracts based on the template.

attributes.name: introducedversion
attributes.description: Version in which the form is introduced.
